title: CoinFlask
description: CoinFlask is a rudimentary version of CoinGecko.com that provides cryptocurrency market information of the top 100 coins in real-time and preserves state.

title: Vibers NFT Collection
description: Vibers is a 10k NFT collection that encompasses the ethos of web3 by taking inspiration from a wide range of iconic NFT collections to create an entirely new and original CC0 project.

title: Cosmic Caps NFT Collection
description: Cosmic Caps is a NFT collection of 10k 3D rendered mushrooms created using an algorithm in Blender. This collection is currently live on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: BlockForge NFT P2E Game
description: Blockforge is a Ethereum based Play-To-Earn metaverse built on Minecraft. The server has integrated NFTs that enable users to earn $FORGE tokens while playing on the server.

title: Gegoo, Inc.
description: Gegoo was a brand awareness and promotional web application built by my company, Mod Technologies LLC. Gegoo was a startup located in Dearborn, MI.

title: ERC721 Data Collection Tool
description: This repository queries the Ethereum blockchain for user defined ERC721 contracts for events pertaining to the specified tokens IDs. The data is added to a Mongo database and can be queried to my frontend.
